thread.title: 3 day trip to London.
thread.title_full: 3 day trip to London. - Review of Lidos Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: David N
title: 3 day trip to London.
text:
I stayed for 2 nights 3 days, had a lovely room, 3 stars, great location, close to the tube, Boris's bikes, the Natural History museum, the Thames and Victoria station. Quiet family room with continental breakfast included, and free wifi.
Room Tip: I had a lovely quiet room at the back. See more room tips
